reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and makes sweeping the floor fast and easy. So convenient. Love it !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love the DUST PAN
reviews.reviewText: The broom is not sturdy, I do love the bristles!!Let’s talk Dustpans!5 stars and more.I’m old and I no longer have to bend over.I’m flipping HAPPY 😃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap not heavy duty
reviews.reviewText: Cheap small not the size of a regular broom. The bristles on the broom brush are thin and feels like toy for kids. Does not sweep well. The dust pan is nice. It was easy to put together but the broom brush is too small for actual sweeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is great!
reviews.reviewText: It stands up just like it says all by itself freestanding completely. The picture was a little bit deceiving it needs to be flat but it works. The other thing is great is that comb feature for the broom when you sleep it into the dustpan you're able to comb the lint or in my case I have a German shepherd and all of the dog here comes right out don't even have to bend over or do anything and it doesn't stick to the room like he used to it goes right in there and that's it. Sleeping is now actually kind of funny cuz it does its job so easily and fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality not great
reviews.reviewText: First one had to be returned because of a cracked bucket. Second one in good shape but plastic is very thin. Could be better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Such great comb on the dust pan for a sparse bristle broom head. I didn’t bother assembling it. I know it will miss a lot of dirt. I would prefer this with a dense amount of bristles and a wider broom head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update.... outstanding customer service
reviews.reviewText: I was extremely excited to have this to take with me to clean my airbnbs however it's causing me more work than I already had since the broom keeps shedding and I have to stop every other room to put the handle back together.1-5-24They are the first to respond to one of my reviews and they responded quickly. They will be replacing my broom at no cost to me and I didn't have to ask they have also offered some refund. I will continue to purchase and try other items from a company with great customer service. Stuff happens but great customer service is intentional and that speaks volumes.True to their word they sent me a replacement broom. This broom is much thicker and we have not had any issues with shedding. It's exactly what I had hoped for when I ordered it to begin with. And again the customer service is top notch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE....I've changed the stars to 5. We found the handle, our mistake.The broom is missing the top handle. I wish they could just send me a handle and I wouldn't have to return it. Other than that, where has this been my whole life. Makes sweeping less stress on your back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: No more bending down to sweep the mess off your floor ...
reviews.reviewText: There are 2 items in this pack (4 if you count the little dustpan and brush which comes in the box.)The first item is the brush itself, which is about 1360mm tall and comes in 4 pieces which screw into each other, which the handle being the top piece. Once screwed together, screwing the brush into place, you’re ready to begin brushing … almost. (These handles can be shortened by adding less poles)The second item is the dustpan which stands at about 1600mm tall and come in 3 pieces which, again, screw together. The handle is at a right handle, at the top, and the dustpan is at the bottom.With both items screwed together you’re ready to brush up.The brush head is pretty strong with the bristles made of a firm, yet soft enough bristles which manage to brush up the dirt which them buckling under the slight pressure.The dustpan is moveable, hinged to go up and down so that when you’re brushing the pan lies flat on the ground so you can brush the dirt into it. Then, once done, it can be flipped up to hold the dirt inside, like a small bucket.The pan also has a nice feature, this being the orange teeth like plastic on the top. This is designed to help clean the brush heads bristle. Just pull the bristled through the teeth and the excess dust/dirt will be pulled out, into the bucket/pan.It's as simple as that.The one negative, for me is that the metal pole doesn’t feel as strong as some brushes I’ve used and, I’m guessing here, with a little too much pressure I can see this bending, or even snapping. But if you’re careful then the pole should be fine.In all, a fine dust pan and crush which means you no longer have to bend down to pick up the debris from the floor. Ideal for those people with bad backs … or just lazy when it comes to brushing up, like myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This broom and dustpan set arrived in a few pieces so it was self assembly, having said that it was super easy to do just a case of screwing the pole ends together.The broom fits neatly in to the dustpan when not in use so doesn’t take up much space at all.I wanted this set to sweep up the leaves in the garden save having to keep bending down and it does that job perfectly easy to empty in the bin and no more bad back!It also comes with a super cute mini dustpan and brush which is great for counter top crumbs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Cool set for the laminate or tiles surface
reviews.reviewText: The design is really clever as there are teeth to get rid of hair that is stuck onto the bristles that I would normally have to take away.It can also become upright to be stored easily in cramped spaces.Emptying also easy, similarly for cleaning, just simply rinse or spray and wipe clean.Good product for the kitchen.Good price at £22 for an extra mini dustpan and brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well built and robust. Height and length of broom and dustpan is good for those with average height. Well packaged. Strong and thick bristles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After years of using a small non-foldable dustpan outdoors, specifically for leaf pick-up, I decided to upgrade to a more practical and efficient design. Though my previous dustpan served me well, I always had to be careful not to lose leaves from it, and sometimes had to hold them down with the brush.This one holds the rubbish and leaves in without any hassle, it's convenient and really practical and so much easier on my back. Wish I had got one sooner!
